akn:section.akn:heading: Right to discuss terms of contract

akn:content.akn:p: (b) No prohibition of discussion Notwithstanding a provision in any contract between a producer and a processor for the production of livestock or poultry, or in any marketing agreement between a producer and a processor for the sale of livestock or poultry for a term of 1 year or more, that provides that information contained in the contract is confidential, a party to the contract shall not be prohibited from discussing any terms or details of the contract with—
(c) Effect on State laws Subsection (b) does not—
(d) Applicability This section applies to each contract described in subsection (b) that is entered into, amended, renewed, or extended after May 13, 2002.
